opis: Prodaje se kuća s apartmanima u Tkonu. Smještena je na kraju slijepe ulice u mirnom dijelu mjesta, u okruženju borove šume. Izgrađena je na zemljištu od 710 m², a stambena povšina od oko 280 m² raspoređena je na više etaža u kojem je ukupno šest stambenih jednica s jednom ili dvije spavaće sobe. Apartmani u prizemlju imaju prostrane terase u prirodnoj hladovini, a oni na katu balkone s pogledom na more, otočiće i Biograd. U dvorištu je zidani komin. Okućnica je velika i ograđena, s dovoljno mjesta za parkiranje nekoliko automobila. Apartmani su potpuno namješteni i uspješno se iznajmljuju. Kuća je udaljena svega 300 m od mora, trajektnog pristaništa, trgovina i restorana, a oko 400 m od pješčanih plaža. Prednost položaja kuće je blizina svih potrebnih sadržaja, ali istovremeno i dovoljna udaljenost od ljetne gužve. Tkon je atraktivno mjesto za miran odmor, a također i polazna točka za avanturiste željne istraživanja otoka. Povezan je s Biogradom čestim trajektnim linijama (15 minuta plovidbe) te mostom s otokom Ugljanom odakle trajekt vozi za Zadar. A house with apartments for sale in Tkon. It is located at the end of a street in a quiet part of Tkon, surrounded by a pine forest. It was built on a plot of 710 m², and the living area of about 280 m² is spread over several floors in which there are six residential units with one or two bedrooms. The apartments on the ground floor have spacious terraces in natural shade, and those on the first floor have balconies overlooking the sea, islands and Biograd. There is a brick chimney in the yard. The garden is large and fenced, with enough space to park several cars. The apartments are fully furnished and successfully rented. The house is only 300 m away from the sea, ferry port, shops and restaurants, and about 400 m away from the sandy beach. The advantage of the position of the house is the proximity of all necessary facilities, but at the same time sufficient distance from the summer crowds. Tkon is an attractive place for a peaceful vacation, and also a starting point for adventurers eager to explore the island. It is connected to Biograd by frequent ferry lines (15 minutes of sailing) and by the bridge with the island of Ugljan from where the ferry runs to Zadar.
